New Records: Shohei Ohtani set a major league record by homering and stealing a base in the same game for the 14th time
Key Match Events: Teoscar Hernández hit a go-ahead homer leading off the sixth inning
Alex Vesia (4-4) got the victory with one inning of relief
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win reduced the NL West-leading Dodgers' magic number to four to clinch the division
Ohtani’s 27th homer at Dodger Stadium, tying Cody Bellinger for the most at home in a single season
Others: The Rockies got home runs by Charlie Blackmon, Hilliard and Michael Toglia
Colorado's Kyle Freeland (5-8) took the loss, giving up four runs and seven hits in six innings
